name: Sleep boy sleep - horror game
description:
You have to play as a little boy, very much afraid of the dark. He often has nightmares and sees something scary, so his parents have long been used to their son's fears.

Seeing no danger, parents stay late at work three days in a row. 

It was a mistake.

Whose footsteps are those in the corridor?

Whose heavy breathing is that under the bed?

What's that standing outside the window? 

Now it's up to you whether the boy will see his parents again.

Good night!
